attributes.action: Stop Holiday and Travel companies overcharging in the school holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that the government should put pressure on the Travel companies to lower their prices in the school holidays. It is frowned upon and you can even get fined when you wish to take your children out of school but yet most of us cannot afford the prices to take them in the holidays.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
